AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: scrib trainer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran the most prestigious scrib circus in Mournhold. Dozens of Dunmer strolled past every day, completely oblivious to the supposed performance mere metres from them. Of course [PAWN_nameDef] was equally oblivious to the lack of attention, and simply enjoyed watching [PAWN_possessive] scrib thump away.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: netch rancher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on a netch ranch for many years and suffered many stings during this time, While [PAWN_pronoun] learnt some basic medical skills in the thanks to the endless stream of wounds, [PAWN_nameDef] never learnt how to not annoy a netch.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: guar rancher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] used to ranch guar many moons ago. Many hours each day were spent herding the guar, whom often wound up getting their oversized heads stuck in strange places. [PAWN_nameDef] also spent most afternoons crafting new pairs of boots, as [PAWN_possessive] boots were often ruined whilst wandering the fields.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: nix hound trainer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] used to own a quaint little hovel in Hla Oad, where [PAWN_pronoun] spent many hours each day training nix hound pups. Either [PAWN_pronoun] was rather good at this, or nix hounds were just that easy to train. Regardless, [PAWN_nameDef] eventually saved up enough drakes to start a new life, outside of that awful swamp.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: skorati herder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] tended a small herd of skorati. Peaceful creatures, that [PAWN_pronoun] was rather fond of. As an extra bonus, [PAWN_nameDef] could create clothing out of skorati fur, which fetched a decent price in the nearby towns.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: St. Olms fishmonger
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Brewers and Fishmongers Hall of the St. Olms canton. [PAWN_nameDef] looked forward to every day, mostly because [PAWN_pronoun] always knew there was a jug of sujamma with [PAWN_possessive] name on it, just a few steps away.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: silt strider trainer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] once raised silt striders from nymph to adult. It was a long-winded process, as silt strider take a considerable time to reach to adulthood. But at the end of the day, [PAWN_nameDef] got to sit back and relax, listening to the soothing calls of the silt striders.
